22  void BaseWindow::execute(Dmatrix& in, Dmatrix& out) {
23  unsigned int rows = in.size1();
24  for (unsigned int ch = 0; ch < rows; ch++) {
25  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < mWindow.size(); i++) {
26  out(ch, i) = in(ch, i) * mWindow(i);
27  }
28  }
29  }

31  void BaseWindow::execute(Dmatrix& in, Dmatrix& out, unsigned int offset) {
32  unsigned int rows = in.size1();
33  for (unsigned int ch = 0; ch < rows; ch++) {
34  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < mWindow.size(); i++) {
35  out(ch, i) = in(ch, i + offset) * mWindow(i);
36  }
37  }
38  }

71  void BaseWindow::Normalize() {
72  unsigned int wsize = mWindow.size();
73  double norm = 0.0;
74  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < wsize; i++) {
75  norm += mWindow(i) * mWindow(i);
76  }
77  norm = sqrt(wsize / norm);
78  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < wsize; i++) {
79  mWindow(i) *= norm;
80  }
81  }
82 
83  double BaseWindow::CrossAverage(BaseWindow& w1, BaseWindow& w2) {
84  unsigned int wsize1 = w1.GetSize();
85  unsigned int wsize2 = w2.GetSize();
86  unsigned int wsize;
87 
88  if (wsize1 > wsize2) {
89  w2.Resize(wsize1);
90  wsize = wsize1;
91  } else {
92  w1.Resize(wsize2);
93  wsize = wsize2;
94  }
95  double W1W2 = 0.0;
96  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < wsize; i++) {
97  W1W2 += w1(i) * w2(i);
98  }
99  W1W2 /= wsize;
100  w1.Resize(wsize1);
101  w2.Resize(wsize2);
102 
103  return W1W2;
104  }
105 
106  double BaseWindow::CrossSquareAverage(BaseWindow& w1, BaseWindow& w2) {
107  unsigned int wsize1 = w1.GetSize();
108  unsigned int wsize2 = w2.GetSize();
109  unsigned int wsize;
110 
111  if (wsize1 > wsize2) {
112  w2.Resize(wsize1);
113  wsize = wsize1;
114  } else {
115  w1.Resize(wsize2);
116  wsize = wsize2;
117  }
118  double W1W2 = 0.0;
119  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < wsize; i++) {
120  W1W2 += w1(i) * w1(i) * w2(i) * w2(i);
121  }
122  W1W2 /= wsize;
123  w1.Resize(wsize1);
124  w2.Resize(wsize2);
125 
126  return W1W2;
127  }
